timeline.bodyText: Does changing the exception type here preserve the HTTP status code if we hit this error?  If not, that might be a breaking change.  I think I saw a couple of other exception type changes, same question applies.
timeline.author: not-napoleon

replies.bodyText: IllegalArgumentException is a 400. SearchParseException is also.
